mapper.select: select distinct TT.dtl_seq, SUBSTRING_INDEX(TA.PATH, '/', -1) as "taskName", TT.edu_seq, TT.login_id, (select tbu.LOGIN_ID, tbu.NAME, tbu.E_MAIL from TB_USER tbu where tbu.LOGIN_ID = TT.LOGIN_ID) as user, TT.task_dtl_prog, TT.task_dtl_stat, TT.reg_user, TT.reg_dt, TT.qc_id, (select tbch.LOGIN_ID, tbch.NAME, tbch.E_MAIL from TB_USER tbch where tbch.LOGIN_ID = TT.QC_ID) as checker from TB_TASK_DTL TT JOIN TB_ATT TA on TT.DTL_SEQ = TA.DTL_SEQ AND TT.EDU_SEQ = TA.EDU_SEQ where TT.EDU_SEQ = #{projectId}
